DOC.brief_summary: The study was conducted to investigate how postural changes including sitting, supine, and LDP(lateral decubitus position) affect the IOP(intraocular pressure) of SO(silicone oil-filled eyes. In addition, this study compared the IOP changes between the SO-filled eyes and the fellow eyes in each body position.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Postural Changes on Intraocular Pressure in Silicone Oil-filled Eyes
DOC.criteria: patients who had a 23gauge pars plana vitrectomy must be done with SO(silicone oil,5,000 centistrokes) endotamponade using the Accurus system (Alcon Laboratories, Inc, Hünenberg,Switzerland) previous history or presence of glaucoma or uveitis IOP of ≥24 mmHg use of any antiglaucoma agents narrow angles corneal abnormality or diseases that could affect IOP refractive error exceeding a spherical equivalent of 6 diopters.
